Class IskraDLMSReader

java.lang.Object
com.Meter.IskraemcoInterns.IskraDLMSReader
public class IskraDLMSReader extends Object
This is the class that holds all the attributes and functions to deal with the meter

  • Method Details

    • close

      public void close()
      this function closes the serial connection

    • registerReader

      public String registerReader() throws Exception
      this function is for reading the energy of a meter
      Returns:
      a string that carries the value of the energy reading
      Throws:
      Exception - when meter is not connected

    • clockReader

      public String clockReader() throws Exception
      This function is to read the clock of a meter
      Returns:
      a string that carries the date and time of the clock
      Throws:
      Exception - when meter is not connected

    • meterConnection

      public void meterConnection() throws Exception
      this function calls another function called media connection which is responsible for opening the serial connection, making a handshake with the meter and doing the required protocols to open a connection with the meter.
      Throws:
      Exception - when media connection has invalid configurations or cant connect with the meter due to unknown circumstances

    • mediaConnection

      public void mediaConnection() throws Exception
      this function is called upon by meter connection
      Throws:
      Exception - when media connection has invalid configurations or cant connect with the meter due to unknown circumstances

    • SNRM

      public void SNRM() throws Exception
      send the SNRM protocol for the handshake, called by the handshake function
      Throws:
      Exception - if we have no reply from the meter

    • AARQ

      public void AARQ() throws Exception
      send the AARQ protocol for the handshake, called by the handshake function
      Throws:
      Exception - if we get no reply from the meter

    • relayStateReader

      public String relayStateReader() throws Exception
      This function tells us the relay state of the meter (opened or closed)
      Returns:
      a string that carries the relay state
      Throws:
      Exception - when the meter is inaccessible

    • relayDisconnector

      public String relayDisconnector() throws Exception
      closes off the relay of the meter
      Returns:
      a string that says the operation was successful
      Throws:
      Exception - if the meter is inaccessible

    • relayConnector

      public String relayConnector() throws Exception
      open the relay of the meter
      Returns:
      a string that says the operation was successful
      Throws:
      Exception - if the meter is inaccessible

    • clockWritter

      public void clockWritter(Calendar Time) throws Exception
      sets the clock of the meter to the time given to it
      Parameters:
      Time - an object of type Calendar that carries the time
      Throws:
      Exception - if the meter is inaccessible

    • handshake

      public void handshake() throws Exception
      This calls the AARQ and SNRM functions to perform a complete handshake with the meter to open the connection
      Throws:
      Exception - if the meter is inaccessible or doesn't respond
